content: Rick Kazman | The Shidler College of Business Skip to main content The Shidler College of Business MenuClose Information Technology Management Rick Kazman Danny and Elsa Lui Distinguished Professor of Information Technology Management RoomShidler C-401c Emailkazman@hawaii.edu Phone(808) 956-6948 Website(s)Github siteYouTube Channel cv.kazman.pdf Academic BackgroundI am interested in the architectural design and analysis of large, complex software-intensive systems. I care not only about the technical aspects of design but also the economic, social, and environmental implications of design decisions. My methods and tools have been adopted by Fortune 500 companies world-wide. According to Google Scholar my research has been cited over 30,000 times. In my spare time I like to do gardening, practice taekwondo, ride my bike, play piano, and sing.
